name: Lovers shell
description:
This demo was created for the Otome game jam 2022 hosted by Akua & Azuremia.

Take the shoes of a young high school student in an anime inspired world as she interacts with strange people. Will any of them pull your heartstrings ? Where does her heart lies ? The answer depends on you. (though here you only have one guy to fall for, wait for the full game!!!)
